<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expressed in terms of the original input not the &quot;real&quot; rewrite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffer.  How do we compute that reliably?  It might be tempting to use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// curLineStartOffs + OrigOffset - RealOffset, but that assumes the</span></CodeLine>
